metadata.title: CVE-2023-49994 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Espeak-ng 1.52-dev was discovered to contain a Floating Point Exception viathe function PeaksToHarmspect at wavegen.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49994` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

espeak-ng - 1.50+dfsg-10ubuntu0.1
espeak-ng-data - 1.50+dfsg-10ubuntu0.1
espeak-ng-espeak - 1.50+dfsg-10ubuntu0.1
libespeak-ng-libespeak1 - 1.50+dfsg-10ubuntu0.1
libespeak-ng1 - 1.50+dfsg-10ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: espeak-ng package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.50+dfsg-10ubuntu0.1').
